abstract: Cleveland Mayor Frank Jackson says he did not trust a state agency to investigate the fatal police shooting of Tamir Rice, 12-year-old boy who was carrying a pellet gun; contends agency mishandled investigation of 2012 fatal police shooting of two people.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Frank Jackson of Cleveland says he did not trust a state agency to investigate the fatal police shooting of Tamir Rice, a 12-year-old boy who was carrying a pellet gun.
snippet: Mayor Frank Jackson of Cleveland says he did not trust a state agency to investigate the fatal police shooting of Tamir Rice, a 12-year-old boy who was carrying a pellet gun.

headline.main: Ohio: Mayor Faults Inquiry Into Shooting by Police
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Mayor Faults Past State Inquiry in Police Killing
